title: The Road Of Resistance Part II
description:
After a former gang member's bid to survive the collapse, leads to all out rebellion and the rise of a Camelot inspired kingdom, King Chessed of the Vanguard must prepare his fledgling nation for all-out war against human traffickers and hate groups in The Road of Resistance!






After medieval weapons became the only weapons, Chessed decided to make years of S.C.A honed combat skills work in his favor. Setting out with his homies on a modern-day Viking style raid, he had expected supplies, not to find himself as a vigilante hero and the leader of a separatist kingdom! Now he must rebuild society and rally a rag-tag army of ex-criminals, military deserters, and terriified survivors into an army strong enough to face the threat of a corrupt hostile government and human traffickers bent on genocide!







Fans of dystopian fiction best sellers like The Hunger Games, and books like Lord of the Rings finally have a series that delivers the best of both worlds! This harrowing journey weaves a magnificent tapestry of visceral realism, steamy romance, thrilling conspiracy, and fast paced action for an epic tale of survival and rebuilding. New voice in African American fiction Chase Bolling returns bringing beautifully crafted world building, and cinematic prose making The Road of Resistance Part 2 must read military fantasy fiction perfect for readers searching for diverse books and those who crave books with realistic combat!
author: Chase Bolling
